USA: New Netherland was permanently relinquished to England under the Treaty of Westminster.
Sweden: Sweden invades Brandenburg, triggering the Swedish-Brandenburg War.
Russia: The Cossacks of the Right-bank Ukraine elected the pro-Muscovite Ivan Samoylovych, Hetman of the Left-bank Ukraine, to replace Doroshenko and become the Hetman of a unified Ukraine.
India: Forces led by Shivaji defeat Aurangzeb's troops, and establishes Maratha Empire.
